title: Step
---
Each step contains a body view with optional headline and supporting text.

## Constructors
### Step
Step creates a new TStep with the given body view.

---
## Methods
| Method | Description |
|--------| ------------|
| `Headline(headline string)` | Headline sets the headline text of the step. |
| `SupportingText(supportingText string)` | SupportingText sets the supporting text of the step. |
